roleset.name: cause to be no longer dependent on

WEANING-N NOTES: Based on temprel and stratified data. Comparison to wean.01. Wean.01-v is a member of VN class cheat-10.6. Framed by Katie. (from weaning.01-n)

roles.note: Can also occur with arg2-off and arg2-of. (from wean.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: But [Time]-1, as part of the more cost-conscious Time Warner, wants [*-1]to wean itself away from expensive gimmicks.
The weaning of children from the bottle
